title: A Secret Method for Manifesting
description:
OMG, what an episode of Dear Gabby! To open the show, I pulled this card: When I’m connected to my joyful presence, I attract support from the Universe. When I read those words, I am instantly soothed and my heart opens. But here’s the thing: You don’t have to be in a constant state of joy to attract miracles.

On today’s Dear Gabby episode, you’ll witness gorgeous vibrational transformations and have the opportunity to witness one miracle moment after the next as my guests move from despair to hope and acceptance in an instant. And you know I’ve got your back: During the show, I break down how to bust free from despair using simple, small steps anyone can apply. The tools are available to you now.

You'll also learn:
  • How to reach for the next best-feeling thought, even and especially when you’re in despair
  • A simple prayer that you can use every day to open up your consciousness to divine guidance, spiritual wisdom and hope
  • How to reenter the “real world” post-pandemic with a rock-solid sense of inner peace
  • How to do less and attract more, and why manifesting doesn’t always equal doing

Why it’s counterproductive to worry about other people’s opinions, and how to redirect your energy onto what really matters

RESOURCES:

The following are helpful resources and books I mention in the episode.

Claim your FREE GIFT: My BEST guided meditation is available to you when you become a Dear Gabby Ambassador by subscribing to the show and leaving a review: https://gabbybernstein.com/deargabby-freemeditation/ 

BOOKS & CARD DECKS

The Universe Has Your Back card deck: https://bit.ly/3l9VLTL
The Universe Has Your Back: https://bit.ly/3iei0Gq
Super Attractor: https://bit.ly/3xdwBWT
Spirit Junkie: https://amzn.to/3hjdFA0


MENTAL HEALTH RESOURCES

AA (Alcoholics Anonymous): aa.org
Safety, Recovery and Mental Health Resources: https://bit.ly/2TIaAl7
Mental Health Resources and My Story of Recovery from Postpartum Anxiety and Depression: https://bit.ly/2TIaAl7
MIRACLE MEMBERSHIP

Want even more support? I created the Miracle Membership to help you design a spiritual practice you can stick to—so you can feel connected, supported and inspired every day. Each month I deliver brand new workshops, guided meditations, live group meditations, community connection, and so much more. Plus, it’s easy to access on your phone, computer or tablet. Click here to join https://bit.ly/3ygOiG4
 
 
PARTNERS
 

Go to GreenChef.com/gabby100 and use code gabby100 to get $100 off including free shipping!

 

Show your skin you care with the Athena Club Razor Kit! Sign up today and you’ll get 20% off your first order! Just go to AthenaClub.com and use promo code deargabby.

 

For listeners of the show, Calm is offering a special limited time promotion of 40% off a Calm Premium subscription at CALM.COM/deargabby

  

Produced by Dear Media.
